target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings and classified the contract as safe, but the contract contains a denial of service vulnerability in the emptyCreditors function.

notes: The contract contains a denial of service vulnerability in the emptyCreditors function. When creditorAddresses.length > 1500, it resets the array and sets win = true. However, the addCreditors function only adds 350 entries per call. An attacker could repeatedly call addCreditors until the length exceeds 1500, then call emptyCreditors to set win = true. After that, any subsequent call to emptyCreditors would fail because creditorAddresses.length would be 0 (not > 1500), preventing legitimate users from ever setting win = true again. This is a classic denial of service vulnerability. The audit missed this entirely.
